page.shortlink: api alpha5 thread xbasic trace begin method
page.description: Trace XBasic execution (if source is available).
page.prototype: thread.XBasic_Trace_Begin(FileName as C, TraceVariables as L)

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The file where the trace log is written.

argument.name: TraceVariables
argument.description: Indicates whether or not variables should be traced.
